short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upgraded features for TrakED in the THS. (This extension is not an official product of the THS or Intersystems TrakCare software.)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Upgraded features for Trak ED in the LGH. 

Features:
 - Re-enable spell check in the triage page
 - Use the enter key when logging in
 - Handover sheet for ED Main Floor and EMU
 - ED Main Floor filters and persistent sort
 - Triage Summary print out
 - Filter and count results of an enquiry
 - Count patients currently breaching length of stay targets


-- This extension is not an official product of the LGH or InterSystems Trak software.
